notes.Usage: Each KB file is modular. Phoenix references modules based on context. Updates can be made to one file without impacting others.
notes.Priorities: Seller pillar capture (Motivation + Condition + Timeline + Price) is mandatory before booking. Agent, Buyer, and Foreclosure KBs handle special paths.
notes.NextSteps: Add additional modules (e.g., Negotiation, ObjectionHandling, CreativeFinancePlaybooks) as the system matures.
